description: FineReader is a suite of PDF management tools that allows users to open, edit, and convert PDF documents. However, before a user can edit a PDF's text, FineReader must process the document's text and convert it to an editable format.

To process and convert text, FineReader uses language-specific data stored in a set of LCD files (installed with the program). After FineReader uses its LCD files to process a document's text, a user can edit that text.
